reviews.review_text: Great food, friendly service. Good portions. Delicious. Feels like a bit of Greece.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Greg for the great review

reviews.review_text: Ordered the roast lamb and calamari dinner, and both were excellent. The lamb was super tender and well seasoned, and the calamari was lightly battered and fried nicely for a grrat crisp. The Greek potato was delicious, I wish they served two on the plate. The rice pilaf wasnt the best Ive had - couldve used more flavour and unfortunately it was cold. However, the lamb and potato were warm so it was fine to eat with the rice. They also served free pita bread which came out hot and fresh and great with the Tzatziki. Great patio setting, I like that they have the plastic barriers up to separate the tables - it makes it more intimate and quiet. The place was packed on a Saturday night and they only had three servers. Waited about 15 min for a table at 8pm and many people were stopping in for pizza take out. Table service was a bit slow but our service did a great job and was friendly.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Megan for the great review

reviews.review_text: Great food great service! I had the calabrese pizza and it was amazing, overall high quality and affordable! The owner is also very friendly and down to earth like all of the staff. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for good food in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Aden for the great review

reviews.review_text: I ordered the double cheese pizza. Wow! I want to add that Im from Chicago and deep dish and tavern style is not a thing in Vancouver. However if youre from the Chicago area or want to catch a glimpse of what that pizza is like and you are craving a traditional pan (pan, not deep dish, huge difference) pizza from the chicago area Id suggest Olympia. The cheese is salty like I miss from home and the dough is crispy but airy just like our pan pizzas. Thank you so much Olympia for giving me a little memory from home. If you order take out finely grate some Parmesan and grab some chili flakes and its the closest to Chicago pizza youll get in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jessica for the great review

reviews.review_text: Baked tortellini was to die for. The prices are incredibly low for the amount of food you receive and the lovely wait staff are just so charming. This is such a hidden gem!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Seamus for the great review

reviews.review_text: Consistently great pizza with great variety of toppings and styles. Service is fast, prices are reasonable; Can t go wrong with this place I like dinning here. Food : 5/5 |
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Shamim for the great review.

reviews.review_text: Ordered the calamari biggest portion i have ever gotten so skimping on this one it was enough to have as a start up meal also was amazing cooked perfectly my mother and sister had the souvlaki i didnt get to taste theirs since they ate it up quickly will be coming back

Tried this location for the first time.  I ordered the steak and prawns, which was $28.  I thought for that price its probably pretty small and I might not be full, especially since last week I ordered the same thing at another place and it was over $50.  When it showed up I was shocked, it was a nice sized steak, a skewer of prawns, a baked potato with sour cream and butter, a full side of mushrooms and garlic bread, and it was very tasty.  It was significantly bigger than the similar dish I got last week from another restaurant.  The steak from my meal last week might have been slightly better but no where near almost double the money better.  Definitely recommend this place, everything Ive tried at the Kits and Denman locations have not disappointed.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Sam for the great review

reviews.review_text: I came here with family for lunch.  We ordered various combinations lamb, spanakopita, and soup.  The food was delicious. The price was about what you expect for lunch 10-15CAD per person.  I would eat here again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sean for the great review

reviews.review_text: Cute place on Denman. We ate on the 6 is enclosed with heat lamps, so it was cozy. Ribs and lasagna so good. Cant believe I waited all my life to eat here.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Vivean for the great review   see you again

reviews.review_text: Great service, good atmosphere and awesome food! I went with a few friends and we had the Greek and the Meat lovers pizza in large sizes (enough for 4 people to eat 3 or 4 slices each) and drank a beer pitcher. I must say that was one of the best pizzas Ive tried since I arrived in Vancouver, so I want to go back to try others flavours and dishes. Highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Yolanda for the great review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our pizza and beer.

reviews.review_text: Best take out I have had in Vancouver in years. Got it delivered directly from the restaurant and everything was outstanding. Portions were much superior compared to anywhere else, fresh, value on point and came in half the time they originally quoted.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Cameron for the great review.

reviews.review_text: Roast Lamb, Calamari, spaghetti & meatballs, and pizza. Huge portions, all great tasting; youngest didnt finish the pizza so we took it home and ate it for lunch the next day. Calamari was nicely cooked (lacked a little colour on the batter, but rather that than overcooked and rubbery. But oh my god, how good was the roast lamb? 5 stars just for that, but the rest didnt disappoint either!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Steve for the great review

reviews.review_text: Good location, excellent service, and perfect food. I visited there for the first time, but it was very comfortable. The L-size pizza was just the right size for three men to share. The taste was great, and we were satisfied. I will come back again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Suguru for the great review

reviews.review_text: I ordered pizza(meat lovers) and it was super delicious! If you order pizza for yourself, small size is enough. I m super appreciate their customer services. The restaurant is not huge, but it was comfortable to stay there. I d love to come back again with my friends:)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Yama for the great review

reviews.review_text: I went the other day and had a really good time! Not only was the food delicious (we had pizza) and great portions, the staff was so welcoming and took really good care of us. We ordered and got the food fast, even though there was a full house, the quality was great and the ambiance was cozy and funky. Its a place I would go back for sure.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mariana for the great review! We are looking forward to welcoming you again!

reviews.review_text: First time ever today. Good service, great food. Beautiful old school Greek environment. Very fairly priced large portions. Pizza was phenomenal.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ponda for the great review   see you again

reviews.review_text: Been four or five years since our last meal at Olympia Pizza - it was just as great as before!  Thank you - great staff, great meal, great atmosphere.  October 4, 2023 Wheelchair accessibility: I use a walker but there was plenty of room at the table for a wheelchair.  Once I was seated the staff took my walker and folded it away near the front desk.  We had a calamari appetiser, followed by the  ribs,  lamb souvlaki, and lamb chops - they were all delicious!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Margo for the great review   see you soon

reviews.review_text: We had a lovely meal here the best we had in our trip so we will be back. The roasted lamb was generous and delicious Jug of beer for $15 also great deal it was nice to get reasonably priced meal that was also outstanding food. Nice patio on street Great service
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Brian for the great review

reviews.review_text: Much love to you for providing us with such wonderful food. The food was hot when arrived!! The lamb was out of this world...but for me its the potatoes. You made my roast lamb/potatoes dreams come true Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Angela for the great review

reviews.review_text: Excellent place for a casual dinner. Good prices and great service. Our zucchini sticks were not prepared correctly and were quite soggy. At the end of our meal the server noticed we didnt eat them. We explained they were too wet to eat. She took them away came back and took them off our bill. Very conscientious server. The rest of our food was delicious. We will definitely go back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mark for the great review

reviews.review_text: Really good greek food! Loved everything we ordered. The service was amazing as well. I will definitely be back. Also, such a cute place with Greece vibe
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Y L for the great review see you soon

reviews.review_text: This place never disappoints me. After loving their moussaka last time, now I got to try their pizza and lasagna and everything was just delicious. One of my favorite restaurants in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Eduardo for the great review

reviews.review_text: The best pizza in town without any doubt. They deliver as well. Great service, friendly staff and delicious food. You gotta try it out. Pasta is amazing too.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ali for the great review.

reviews.review_text: I d like to recommend the restaurant. I tried 2  large size pizza with 4 people, and they were really delicious and large portion for us. I was so satisfied with the pizza. Also, the server was nice to us. I m sure I will visit the restaurant and try others.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Nanae for the great review! We would be happy to welcome you next time again

reviews.review_text: One of my favourites in Vancouver! The best prices you get during lunchtime. Went there a couple of times and always ordered the lamb. It is delicious and affordable. I think the restaurant only has 2 workers so everything takes time but it creates a nice and chill atmosphere

The best pizza in vancouver! I ate a BBQ chicken pizza that the number is 29. It was so nice. Dough is crispy and the restaurant mood is also wonderful. If i have a chance to go there i definitely want to go there again. All staff was so kind. Thank you for olympia pizZa!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Daisys for the great review

reviews.review_text: Love them. It had been a while since I had Greek food and was happy to enjoy their food. Going in is better, ordering for take out can be busy becusee they can be swamped. Food is filling and super delicious. Definitely recommend. Met some good people. Yum yum yum.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sahiba for the great review

reviews.review_text: Excellent food, everything was flavourful, the lamb chops in particular are a stand out. Will definitely return. Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: After a long days work the 5 star makes my day thank you very much Michael see you shortly.

reviews.review_text: Has a great atmosphere. Good waitresses and really good food. Vegetarian options: Easy access from Denmod. Cant say anything about the parking. Kid-friendliness: They have high chairs for the little ones.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Michael for the great review

reviews.review_text: (These guys have a pick up surcharge of $1 lol. SURCHARGE. What a joke.) - EDIT: Apparently this is the Kits location, not denman, apologies.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks JD

reviews.review_text: Amazing lamb! The staff know their stuff, and the food is top-notch. Feels home made.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Jaylin for the great review

reviews.review_text: Suuuuper tasty. Ive always seen the place and wanted to go and finally ordered some delivery tonight. We got moussaka, pizza, lasagne and calamari. My favourite was the moussaka, but they were all really amazing, and I look forward to trying more dishes from here in future. Highly recommend this place, yum!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Amber for the great review

reviews.review_text: Great location close to English bay, very rustic but the food was delicious, portions huge, and prices very good! Had a few dishes, all good, but really loved the roast lamb!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Eric for the great review

reviews.review_text: Learned about them from a r/nicevancouver subreddit while asking for the best pizza in town (not to be confused with the terrible r/vancouver subreddit) I can safely say that this hands down was the best food I ate in Vancouver in my 15 years living here. Absolutely heavenly! Absolutely out of this world flavours! I can not begin to explain how amazing the moussaka, the lasagna and their house special pizza were These are the guys that need to make money, and be praised for the culinary wonder they provide! Do yourself a favour and go try it out.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Cenk for the great review

reviews.review_text: This is my go to when I really want pizza. I love everything else too but got a half my Greek pizza. I love John and everyone there. Great ambiance great service so lucky they are in the hood. Parking: There is a Parkade right across the street in the Denman Mall. I only ever see foot traffic, so not sure who drives there Kid-friendliness: My niece and nephew go there, and they are seven or nine years old and they love it. I just wish they would behave Lol. Just kidding. They are great kids and they are welcome there. Wheelchair accessibility: Definitely wheelchair accessible however, maybe the washrooms might be a bit tricky?
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Liz for the great review

reviews.review_text: The food and service was great.  We ordered a number 13 pizza, a pasta, and a couple vegetarian dishes.  The food was very tasty.  Our server was very attentive and made us feel very welcome.  Great overall experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Tony for the great review

reviews.review_text: Love, love, love I cant say that enough I have always enjoyed Myself every time that I have gone out to Olympia Greek Food and Pizza Restaurant?  There food is always so delicious, tasty and cooked anyway you like to have your food cooked?  Theres Specials throughout the week thats when I love going to the Restaurant for their specials
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Pamala for the great review

reviews.review_text: This restaurant made me happier with the great environment, staff, and excellent pizza!! We have shared two large pizzas with five mates. Truth be told, we were satisfied with the vast amount of pieces. I really recommend to spend a brilliant time there!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Yuu for the great review! And We are so happy that you enjoyed our pizza.

reviews.review_text: I had the salmon souvlaki, which came with rice, greek salad, roast potato, tzatziki and pita bread. Everything was very fresh and tasty, the price was good for the huge amount of food. Staff was kind, she explained the dishes and gave me suggestions. Nice environment, amazing food, great service. I definitely recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Natalie for the great review

reviews.review_text: Went in for the first time and met the owner, Miso, and hes a super nice guy. Got a pizza to go. Pizza was great, I highly recommend it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Marc for the great review

reviews.review_text: Well prepared food, service is a little slow, but its worth the wait. I have to eat here at least once whenever Im in Vancouver.

I cannot say enough good things about Olympia pizza. The staff is always really friendly. They make good pizza but I like the baked tortellini with meat sauce. I eat in if with someone else but if its just me I get  it to go and scarf it down in the privacy of my own place. Dinner doesnt last long. Some garlic bread to get the rest of the meat sauce. Then its time to undo the top button on your pants cause there feeling tight
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ricky for the great review

reviews.review_text: The West Ends timeless classic. Arguably the citys best pizza. Good service. Modestly priced. Vancouver casual. One of the most consistent long running establishments in the neighbourhood. Their Moussaka is my personal favourite. Enjoy!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Chris for the great review

reviews.review_text: Thank you to the owner Mike who stood outside and watched my mountain bike while I went inside to pick up my order, now this is true community!! Pizza is delicious every time
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Lee for the great review

reviews.review_text: My friend and I just came across this place and decided to try it, totally happy that we did! The lamb was honestly one of the best things Ive had in a while, and the price is totally reasonable for what you get. We got takeout and I was super impressed cause I usually dont have high expectations for takeout. Will be back again
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ariana for the great review

reviews.review_text: The skip the dishes driver delivered the pizza to the wrong address and the staff were nice enough to make up for it and give a free dessert. Great customer service and decent pizza
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Sorry to hear that but you ordered from skip so skip should refund you.

reviews.review_text: The food was very wonderful.  The staff were very attentive and pleasant. We dont eat out much but on this visit to Vancouver,  we went to Olympia twice! It did not disappoint! Its a nice place that isnt too noisy .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Linda for the great review

reviews.review_text: Several years ago, my partner and I started coming here regularly with a few friends from volleyball after our Friday night recreation. Now its grown to 20+ some nights. They handle our big group well, and we love the food and service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mitchell for the great review

reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the food, service, location!! Thank you for doing a fantastic job!!! REQUEST ----- please introduce recyclable/compostable takeout containers. The one you are currently using are not environmentally friendly. People are ready to pay a few extra $$. Thank you!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Katrina for the great review

reviews.review_text: Excellent service and wonderful food. My nephew wanted to go to a pizza joint for his birthday so we decided to go here. Dined in, the owner was so kind and accommodating especially considering we had three small children with us. At the end, the youngest got sick and barfed all over the floor (had nothing to do with the food, he choked on a candy and getting sick was the aftermath). The owner was so kind and compassionate, didnt even bat an eye when I told him. The pizza was awesome! Thick crispy crust, loads of toppings, nothing like the cardboard-like stuff you get from the usual pizza delivery places. Really big portions. The owner gave the birthday boy a complimentary slice of cake for his birthday, bagged up to go. Dont open it until you get home, he said. So kind! Excellent value for dine in. Its not a fancy place at all, but the service outclassed many of the five star $$$$ places Ive dined in in the past. I would definitely go again for the pizza and the welcoming environment.

The best pizza in Vancouver. I order the vegetarian with pepperoni, pineapple instead of olives. The vegetables are so fresh. They are quite liberal with the pineapple, which I love. I go there every time I am in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ingrid for the great review

reviews.review_text: The best pizza I ever had in Vancouver. The best crust ever.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mahsa for the great review see you soon

reviews.review_text: Delicious food, good prices, and their patio is open and covid-19 safe!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Alisa for the great review see you soon.

reviews.review_text: Their Greek Pizza is amazing!! It is my go to there
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Leanne for the great review

reviews.review_text: I are pizza which is put on olive. Of course, the taste was good. Also the cuisine was good quantity and not so expensive. Lamb meat Plate looked good, so I want to try it next time!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you hiroki for the great review. We would be happy to welcome you again next time.

reviews.review_text: Moussaka and grilled chicken lunch specials were awesome. Great quality, great value. Not too greasy. Good spot!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Matt for the great review

reviews.review_text: Get the moussaka ! Staff is awesome and quantities are large. Everything I tried was good and I couldnt finish. Pizza, lasagna, pasta, everything is neat Food : 5/5
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Valentin for the great review

reviews.review_text: The food tastes awesome. The quantities are great and John is an excellent host with a good sense of humour. Cheers guys it was a fun Friday evening with you guys    thanks for making it memorable
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sidharth for the great review

reviews.review_text: Quaint little space, transporting you to a Greek street side. The food is sumptuous and the portions are generous. Reasonably priced, you have various options to choose from. Tried the Lamb Roast and Moussaka. The Lamb was very well done, juicy, and flavoursome and the Moussaka hit the right spots as well! Had a great time, will surely return!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jacob for the great review see you soon

reviews.review_text: Pizza was great so was the calamari Sangari was awsome On the patio it was nice and warm on cold evening How ever I wish the music was a bit louder and better Food : 5/5 |
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Davood for the great review

reviews.review_text: Olympia has become our go-to for pizza night. We absolutely love this pizza. The amount of cheese topping these pies is incredible. It is like the double cheese of any other pizza Ive ever had. I appreciate this place so much. Yeah, some other reviewers have commented the pies are a little greasy, and I guess I can vouche for that, but Id say this is how this style of pizza goes. Especially when it comes with an absolute mountain of cheese that disappears the thickest toppings under a hot ooey-gooey blanket of comatose-inducing casin. Anytime we want to celebrate, this it what we look forward to. Thank you Olympia Pizza & Pasta Restaurant.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mike for the great review

reviews.review_text: Great staffs, kindness services, delicious pizzas
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Hirotomo for the great review

reviews.review_text: One of, if not the, very best pizza Ive ever had!  I had their large vegetarian special with pepperoni & smoked ham, delivered.  It was still hot.  It had a super crust (not too thin; not too thick) & generous toppings.  5 stars - all the way!

Great restaurant but they need to take Credit Cards.  In this COVID world, cash is FILTHY October 2021.  Back to taking credit cards and we have and will return regularly as before.  Great food at a reasonable price, and service from Vanessa is outstanding.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Sorry Arthur for the inconvenience credit machines are coming soon.

reviews.review_text: Best Greek food Downtown! Great staff too.

My wife and I order delivery from here on a regular basis, she normally orders the chicken souvlaki and myself I always order the pizza. Only 2 times in the couple of decades that we have ordered delivery have we had a mix-up in orders, and to me that is A1 service. As well when they were told about the mix-up, the mistake was remedied, and the owner delivered it personally pipping hot with the knowledge that our next order was on them. Not only are the staff very helpful with the menu, but for the Most part their phone manners very friendly. Personally I have only eaten in the restraunt about a handful of times. If you are hungry for a very tasty and filling delivery order This is the one to order from  in the West End of Vancouver!!!  PS to the owner and staff I will have to come down and meet you personally thanks for many years of keeping my wife and myself satisfied (and sometimes MAX our cat).PPS: what ever cheese blend you use on the pizza it is insanely good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sid for the great review

reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed our visit  here ... staff were so friendly, kind and accommodating...food was quite yummy and would definitely return... they definitely provide a great service and highly recommend a visit
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Angie for the great review

reviews.review_text: House special pizza is my go-to for years .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Laura for the great review

reviews.review_text: A staple in the West End, theyve been around for quite a while.  The pizzas are delicious as are the pastas.  I had the baked Penne with meat sauce and my friend had the baked spaghetti.  Both were delicious but too hot to eat when served.  Had to wait until they cooled down a bit.  The service was good and the price quite reasonable.

Had dinner at Olympia today, and it was a great experience! We ordered pita breads with tzatziki and hummus for starters, and moussaka and baked vegetarian tortellini for main course. All the dishes we got tasted amazing, the portions are big (and reasonably priced), and our server was extremely friendly and helpful. Will visit again soon!
The moussaka here is the Best in Vancouver. Somebody s Pappous (grandads) recipe is out of this world!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Emma for the great review

reviews.review_text: Went last night with my family. Wish I knew the name of our server. She was really nice and very efficient. We were hoping to sit outside and they went out of their way to accommodate my request. Everyones food was great. Super reasonably priced too. My server suggested Greek Ribs as I couldnt decide between two items. They were great. Calamari dinner. Lasagne. Chicken Souvalaki. Were also hit with my family. There was cash only policy but there is a atm on site so no worries. The family from Kelowna will be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Taylor for the great review hope to see you soon and your server was Christina and i will let her know too.

reviews.review_text: This is the best restuarant for greek food. Inexpensive, large portions and absolutely delicious.  The moussaka is to die for and their pizza is the best. Will absolutely go back. Recommend this place 100%. Plus the staff are the kindest people. You will not be disappointed!

I recently got a New Job where my Work Site is just a block from Olympia Pizza so on International Pizza Day, I decided to get one of their Pizza Specials with Skewered Lamb and Meat Balls. Best Pizza I Have Ever Tasted In Years!!! I will probably be Celebrating my Pay Days by having one of their Pizzas from now on!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Dave for the great review

reviews.review_text: Amazing does not even begin to describe our experience here. The food was beyond fantastic. Greek food can be hit or miss but we will definitely be back. My wifes lamb was amazingly juicy and fell straight off the bone. My Souvlaki was perfect and my rice was phenomenal. The Cesar dressing on my salad was easily some of the best Ive ever had. Its a tiny restaurant and I easily didnt expect it to be this good. Such a lucky find!
Really delicious Greek food! My salmon souvlaki was excellent but most of my group had the ribs which were Flintstone sized. They were very happy.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Rob for the great review see you soon

reviews.review_text: Enjoyed good house wine and tasty calamari
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Marishka for the great review see you soon.

reviews.review_text: Awesome food! So many great dishes. The calamari is amazing. Roast lamb is cooked to perfection and the pizza is delicious. Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jessica for the great review hope to see you soon.

reviews.review_text: Pizza is very delicious,and the service is wonderful.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ling for the great review

reviews.review_text: Prawn appetizer was delicious as was the saganaki! We all had something different and every dish was excellent - roast lamb, Greek ribs, chicken souvlaki and pizza. All were great. We look forward to coming again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mary for the great review hope to see you again .

reviews.review_text: I dont know what you one star people are talking about. I ordered a pizza over the phone, went in, got the pizza and it was great. Thats what theyre there for. At least give them two stars for good food if they lack in service. Would be a four star but the five is for balance. .
Great pizza! Nice atmosphere, friendly attentive staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks VN for the great review

reviews.review_text: I dont know what people are talking about. The food is exelent and the best Greek food in Vancouver. try the Greek ribs or the meats lovers pizza or any other Item in the menu. The owner is always around, so costumer services is very good and I had been more than 16 years eating there at least twice a month.

This place is a gem ! The food is great and our waitor was so entertaining ! I had the lamb souvlaki which tasted amazing and a glass of this Greek wine my friend suggested. It tasted like pine trees but in an amazing way ! Also the prices are very reasonable! Check it out!
Had a delicious pizza here.  The crust is crispy and tender, perfectly baked!  Best pizza Ive had in a long time!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Marilyn for the great review

reviews.review_text: Massive menu, quality ingredients, home-cooked feel, large portions, fast and polite service. Decor is classic, vaguely tatty/tacky, but definitely classic 70s Greek restaurant. Also excellent value, so overall highly recommended!

The owner and staff were fantastic and the food was unreal. The only downside is we came pretty late and felt bad staying long so we had to rush, but I gotta go back soon and spend more time with that menu! Some of the best greek food Ive ever had.
Great roast lamp dinner.  Has been in the neighborhood for decades.  Friendly staff, patio seating, and delivers.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Gavin for the great review

reviews.review_text: Every time I come to Vancouver I come to this restaurant! A lovely family-run taverna with good, homestyle Greek food. We have had the calamari plate, House Pizza, baked penne, moussaka, souvlaki, spanakopita and bean soup: all delicious, hot and fresh. Reminds me of food we enjoyed while in Athens. The servers were friendly and the service was excellent overall. There is a nice patio outside the restaurant. Reasonable prices. Our kids )9 and 11) usually split an order of pasta and it is plenty for them.
Lots of good stuff on their menu. My friend and I had the shrimp pizza...rare to see this on a menu, and it was delicious!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Robert for the great review

reviews.review_text: Love this place. The Greek/Italian food here is amazing, the fact that you can order a delicious pizza for an appetizer to share and a kalamari plate for the main is such a nice blend. The prices are also very reasonable for the quantity as well as the quality of food that you are receiving in that prime location of downtown Vancouver. The actual restaurant itself has a nice vibe to it, the patio is great to sit at on a hot summer day. There is another Olympia in Kitsilano, on W. Broadway Street, but is nowhere near the same. The Denman location is leaps and bounds better than the Kits location which I try and avoid. Great dinner for a group of friends, family or just for a date. Servers are always really nice and youll leave here with a filled and satisfied stomach without emptying your wallet.

Amazing food!!! My family and I ( 9 people) just popped in for some greek food and we ledt very impressed. The server was a great lady, that was on point with the service and drinks. The food came on time and was delicious. Will for surw come again!
I love Olympia. The chicken souvlaki is phenomenal as is the roast lamb and the price (for lunch at least) is great. Highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Katrina for the great review see you soon.

reviews.review_text: Best date night ever thank you very much for the great evening we will return when were out in tha city again. Try this place for an amazing time great atmosphere very friendly staff. I had the lasagna my babe had the chicken souvlaki. And the hot chocolate is too die for.
we both got pizzas and they were absolutely delicious! everyone was incredibly friendly, even when it got super busy. i would return in a heartbeat:)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Olivia for the great review see you soon

reviews.review_text: Great pizza highly recommended *****

reviews.review_text: Olympia makes the best pizza on the planet. I get delivery regularly and have never had any problems. Super kind and helpful staff too. Thanks Olympia!
